solution_line_template: There are {total_students} x {female_fraction} = <<{total_students}*{female_fraction}={num_females}>>{num_females} females in the school.
Out of the {num_males} males, {num_males} x {foreign_male_fraction} = <<{num_males}*{foreign_male_fraction}={num_foreign_males}>>{num_foreign_males} are male foreign students.
Thus, there are {num_males} - {num_foreign_males} = <<{num_males}-{num_foreign_males}={num_non_foreign_males}>>{num_non_foreign_males} non-foreign male students.
